title: Bima - New Testament (Print)
description: Bima translation of the New Testament. The Bima language, or Bimanese is an Austronesian language spoken on the eastern half of Sumbawa Island, Indonesia, which it shares with speakers of the Sumbawa language

language.name: Bima
language.location: Indonesia, Nusa Tenggara and Southwestern Maluku
language.area: Sunda Islands, east Sumbawa Island, east of the isthmus.
